name: open-strategy-partners-marketing-tools
description: Content editing codes, value map, and positioning tools for product marketing.

examples.title: Value Map Generation
examples.description: Generate an OSP value map for a product with specified features for a target audience.
examples.prompt: Generate an OSP value map for CloudDeploy, focusing on DevOps engineers with these key features: - Automated deployment pipeline - Infrastructure as code support - Real-time monitoring - Multi-cloud compatibility.

examples.title: Meta Information Creation
examples.description: Create optimized metadata for an article based on a specific topic and audience.
examples.prompt: Use the OSP meta tool to generate metadata for an article about containerization best practices. Primary keyword: 'Docker containers', audience: system administrators, content type: technical guide.

examples.title: Content Editing
examples.description: Review technical content using OSP editing codes for improvements.
examples.prompt: Review this technical content using OSP editing codes: Kubernetes helps you manage containers. It's really good at what it does. You can use it to deploy your apps and make them run better.

examples.title: Technical Writing
examples.description: Apply the OSP writing guide to create a document for a specific audience.
examples.prompt: Apply the OSP writing guide to create a tutorial about setting up a CI/CD pipeline for junior developers.
